disclaimer: General guidance only. Not a diagnosis. Please consult your doctor.

chat_messages.message: I'm feeling anxious about tomorrow's scan
I understand your anxiety. It's completely normal to feel this way before scans. Try some deep breathing exercises and remember that you're taking positive steps for your journey.
What questions should I ask my doctor?
Great question! I've prepared a personalized checklist for you. It includes questions about success rates, timeline, and what to expect. You can see it in the preview panel.

preview_cards.title: Pre-Consult Questions
content: What are my specific success rates based on age and condition?
What is the expected timeline for my treatment plan?
What lifestyle changes should I make during treatment?

preview_cards.title: IVF Explained in 90 Seconds
preview_cards.content: A simple, visual explanation of the IVF process designed for Indian families

preview_cards.title: IVF Success Rates by Age
preview_cards.source: Source: ICMR Guidelines for ART Clinics in India, 2023
